basics.name: Mohammad Amer
basics.label: Microsoft MVP | Azure Developer | Microsoft 365 | Technical Lead
basics.summary: I  have been working for more than ten years of combined experience with .NET and SharePoint technology implementations. I find great pleasure in leveraging Microsoft's cutting-edge technologies to create solutions that empower individuals and cultivate community engagement. With a strong foundation in .NET and SharePoint, along with expertise in Microsoft 365, Azure, and the Microsoft Bot Framework, I have developed a diverse skill set. My experience includes crafting highly tailored applications for diverse industries and seamlessly integrating them with various systems. As a proficient solution lead, I excel in global collaboration and team motivation. Moreover, I actively contribute to open-source initiatives. Recently, I embarked on a blogging journey, focusing on SharePoint and Microsoft Teams development.

work.position: Microsoft Tech Lead – .NET | Azure | M365 | Architecture
work.summary: Skilled in designing and modeling solution architectures, developing intranet solutions on SharePoint Online, and leveraging Azure services for feature automation and integration. Skilled in CI/CD pipeline implementation, utilizing Azure DevOps, and syncing content between environments with Azure Logic Apps.
highlights: Designed enterprise-grade solutions architecture using ArchiMate and BlueDolphin.
Built a multilingual SharePoint Online intranet for 6,000+ users across countries.
Automated Azure + SharePoint workflows using Functions, Storage Queues, and Azure AI Translator.
Delivered full CI/CD pipelines in Azure DevOps for rapid deployment.
Developed cross-SharePoint sync via Logic Apps and custom APIs.

work.summary: SharePoint on-premises, SharePoint online development and integrations using Azure Functions
highlights: Built productivity-enhancing SharePoint 2016 web parts and integrations using Azure Functions.
Solved M365 data loss and compliance issues through PowerShell automation and policy tuning.
Modernized legacy WSP solutions for SharePoint 2013.

work.summary: SharePoint on-premises, SharePoint online development and integrations using Azure Functions
highlights: Created a secure cross-domain access solution using Azure Automation, API Management, and SharePoint Online.
Built a mail analysis dashboard using .NET Core, ReactJS, and Exchange Online.
Designed a SPFx-powered internal Wiki with Wikipedia-style UI/UX.
